info.readme:
uWebshop 2.3.0.0 Sandbox Starterkit
This package installs the Sandbox Starterkit for your uWebshop 2 Foundation Installation.
Notice: This starterkit requires the uWebshop 2.3+ Foundation to be already installed!

uwbsHomepage.bodyText:
The uWebshop 2.0 Sandbox gives you a bare-bones website that introduces you to a set of well-defined conventions for building an uWebshop based webshop!

This Sandbox is very basic in form and provided without any design or javascript, an easy way to get you started with a nice collection of HTML/Razor and XSLT! Of course all the uWebshop functionality is also available to use with Javascript/jQuery/JSON.

uWebshop 2.0 can be easily integrated with any existing website or starterkit already available for Umbraco. In a few easy steps explained during installation you will have a fully working webshop without having to learn anything new or make big changes to your current site!

If you see some errors try to publish the uWebshop Node + all children, to update the Examine cache.
uwbsHomepage.siteDescription: An HTML only uWebshop 2.0 blank starter kit!

uwbsCheckout.bodyText:
uWebshop 2.0 one-page-checkout example.

The uWebshop baskethandler makes it possible to easily add all the checkout items on one page, or create diferent froms for each step.
This gives you total freedom to create the shop they way you want it to be!

Info.Name: Textpage
Info.Description: This is the standard content page for a starter kit website.

Info.Name: Homepage
Info.Description: The homepage of a starter kit website.

Template.Name: Basket
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: Category
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderID="cp_content" runat="server">
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopCategory" runat="server"/>
</asp:Content>

Template.Name: Checkout
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: Homepage
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <asp:content contentplaceholderid="cp_content" runat="server">
<umbraco:item runat="server" field="bodyText"/>
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopLatestProducts" runat="server" />
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopRandomProducts" runat="server"/>
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopTopSellingProducts" runat="server" />
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopPaging" runat="server" />
</asp:content>

Template.Name: Product
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <asp:Content ID="Content1" ContentPlaceHolderID="cp_content" runat="server">
<umbraco:Macro Alias="uWebshopProduct" runat="server"/>
</asp:Content>

Template.Name: Store
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: Textpage
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/uwbsSandboxMaster.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

Template.Name: uWebshop Sandbox Starterkit Master
Template.Design: <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
